original_text: And you shall rejoice before the Lord your God, you and your son and your daughter, your male servant and your female servant, the Levite who is within your towns, the sojourner, the fatherless, and the widow who are among you, at the place that the Lord your God will choose, to make his name dwell there.
korean_text: 너와 네 자녀와 노비와 네 성중에 있는 레위인과 및 너희 중에 있는 객과 고아와 과부가 함께 네 하나님 여호와께서 자기의 이름을 두시려고 택하신 곳에서 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할지니라

sentences.original_text: And you shall rejoice before the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워해야 한다

sentences.original_text: you and your son and your daughter
your male servant and your female servant
the Levite who is within your towns
and the widow who are among you
at the place that the Lord your God will choose
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 택하실 그 곳에서

sentences.original_text: to make his name dwell there
